channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Will AI tools revolutionize public health? Not if they continue following old patterns, researchers argue
item.description: A new article shares findings from an extensive literature analysis of AI's current trajectory in health care.
